title: Hey Curator, a piece of advice.
body:
If you're going to remove my post about politics because it's considered insulting, then I feel insulted by everyone's posts that were not my opinion. Please remove those as well. 

It's not a big deal because this is League of Legends GD, and the people here really shouldn't discuss politics anyway.... BUT, if there is a politics discussion, you can't cherry pick certain posts on political issues and remove them because someone finds them offensive. IT'S POLITICS, PEOPLE DO NOT AGREE WITH EACH OTHER.

The only thing insulting about the post I made was the fact that I support Trump's idea about a wall on our Mexican border. I don't support Trump, but I do support this idea. The only people that find this offensive probably aren't American citizens or they support illegal immigration, and in those two cases, their opinion is moot anyway.

So like I said, I was insulted and offended by everything else in that thread, please do something about it.
